comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when a local domain is not supported, typically appearing in a change email dialog or similar interface. The purpose of this text is to inform users that their chosen domain is not compatible for use in this context. It appears on screen as part of the user experience, prompting the user to select a different domain if necessary.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The French translation uses the masculine plural 'domaines' instead of the more appropriate 'domain'. While technically correct, 'domain' is preferred in this context, mirroring the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les domaines ne sont pas supportés

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Domeniile locale nu sunt acceptate' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Local domains are not supported'. 'Locale' should be 'locale'. While understandable, it's a slightly awkward phrasing.

The translation "Псевдодомен верхнего уровня не поддерживается" is not a direct or natural translation of "Local domains are not supported." While "псевдодомен" (pseudodomain) attempts to capture the technical aspect, "Local domains" refers to domains configured locally, often within a development or testing environment. The Russian translation implies a specific type of domain (top-level pseudodomain) which may not be the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation closer to "Поддержка локальных доменов не предусмотрена" or "Локальные домены не поддерживаются" to more accurately reflect the original meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ස්ථානීය වසම් සඳහා සහාය නොදක්වයි' is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English sentence. It could be improved to sound more natural in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation might be 'දේශීය පරිගණක නෙට්වொர்க்கුන් සහාය නොදක්වයි' (Dēśiya pariṭaṭa nēṭvōrku sahāyā nō dakkavai) which translates to 'Local computer networks are not supported'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '不支持本地域' while technically correct, is a somewhat literal and not the most natural way to express 'Local domains are not supported' in Chinese. It can sound a bit stiff. A more idiomatic translation might be '不支持本地域名' or '本地域名不受支持'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '不支持本地域名' or '本地域名不受支持'.
